channel.title: Java programing question
channel.description: This is a question about a run.bat for my java programing skill im new to it umm not to server though im learning to make java programs and im trying to make a run.bat that runs all .class files i have this code for the running[code] java *.class[/code] i get this error when i run it. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Yeller/class Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Yeller.class at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: Yeller.class. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] this is my error its somthing to do with public static void main i dont know what though

item.title: Java programing question
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

just printing Yeller thats all im brand new to this free no guide line stuff lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 07:55:47 pm[/size][hr]heres my yeller.java wich turnes into .class

public class Yeller{ public static void main(String[] args){ System.out.println("Yeller!"); } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 08:13:55 pm[/size][hr]please help
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 30, 2009, 08:15:09 pm[/size][hr]ok i read some stuff on it it says change the classpath but i have a server and all that i just cant do this or else it will mess it up please help im starting to go crazylawl when i do it seperatly it does work but as class it doesnt it gives me this error i keep getting.

Read full topic
